SELECT TBT.ID AS ID, TBT.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBI.ID AS ITEM_ID, TTC.ID AS TREE_CUSTOMIZING_ID, TTC.TREE_CUSTOMIZING_POSITION_X AS TREE_CUSTOMIZING_POSITION_X, TTC.TREE_CUSTOMIZING_POSITION_Y AS TREE_CUSTOMIZING_POSITION_Y, TTC.TREE_CUSTOMIZING_APPLY AS TREE_CUSTOMIZING_APPLY, TBI.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, TBI.ITEM_TYPE AS ITEM_TYPE, TBI.ITEM_IMG_PATH AS ITEM_IMG_PATH, TBI.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM TBL_TREE TBT JOIN TBL_TREE_CUSTOMIZING TTC ON TBT.ID = TBT.ID = TTC.TREE_ID JOIN TBL_ITEM TBI ON TTC.ITEM_ID = TBI.ID WHERE TBT.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
AND TTC.TREE_CUSTOMIZING_APPLY = 1
